name: setup-docs-context
description: Find core markdown docs and prepare them to be added to @Docs.
prompt: Scan this repo for key markdown files (README, docs/**/*.md, design/**/*.md).
List the 5â€“10 most important files with a one-line description each.
For each, propose a clear @Docs title and short summary that will help the agent use it as context.
Do not edit files; only return the list and summaries.
